name: Dr. Cheljee Mangulabnan
title: Attending Cardiologist
bio: Dr. Cheljee focuses on diagnosing and treating heart conditions. With a strong background in cardiovascular medicine, he provides expert care in managing heart disease and supporting patient recovery.

name: Dr. Richelle Anne Santos
title: Consultant Dermatologist
bio: Dr. Richelle treats a wide range of skin, hair, and nail conditions. She offers both medical and cosmetic dermatology services, helping patients maintain healthy skin.

name: Dr. Arthur Camba
title: Attending Neurologist
bio: Dr. Arthur specializes in the brain and nervous system. He manages complex neurological disorders and works closely with patients to improve their quality of life.

name: Dr. Sarah Cari√±o
title: Consultant Pulmonologist
bio: Dr. Sarah handles diseases of the lungs and respiratory system. She treats conditions like asthma, COPD, and pneumonia, and supports patients with long-term breathing issues.

name: Dr. Neil Franco Fernando
title: Consultant Anesthesiologist
bio: Dr. Neil ensures patient safety and comfort during surgeries. He manages anesthesia, monitors vital signs, and helps with pain control during and after operations.

name: Dr. Joel Diama
title: Consultant Podiatrist
bio: Dr. Joel focuses on foot and ankle health. From injuries to chronic conditions, he helps patients stay active and pain-free through personalized treatment plans.

name: Dr. Jhalila Ali
title: Attending Hematologist
bio: Dr. Jhalila treats blood disorders such as anemia, clotting issues, and leukemia. She combines research and clinical care to improve patient outcomes.

name: Dr. John Robert Mallari
title: Consultant Allergist
bio: Dr. Robert diagnoses and manages allergies and immune system conditions. He helps patients find relief from chronic allergies, asthma, and other immune-related issues.

name: Dr. Airon Fama
title: Consultant Nephrologist
bio: Dr. Airon Fama specializes in kidney health and treats conditions such as chronic kidney disease, kidney stones, and hypertension. With a patient-first approach, he focuses on long-term kidney care and disease prevention.
